title: What is the best degree for a 29 year old? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends, what are the goals of this 29 year old? Is he getting a degree solely for a job, or is it for a promotion at a job he has, where his major doesn’t matter? Does he want to start a business? Does he want to be a graphic designer? Does he want to sell weed out of a van? Decide what you want to do, then pick the degree that best matches your interests.
